name: set_personality_profile
description: Store the user's personality assessment results after analyzing their responses to personality questions

parameters.description: Primary DISC personality type. Must be exactly one of: D, I, S, C
Enneagram type number as string. Must be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9. Try to match the most similar type
Confidence level between 0.7 and 1.0. Only call this tool if confidence is 0.7 or higher.
